titles.title: 443 Art Thou Weary Heavy Laden (nice easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Art thou weary heavy laden
Arth thou sore distrest
Come to me - saith one
And coming - Be at rest

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hath He marks
To lead me to Him
If He be my guide
In His feet and hands
Are wound-prints
And His side

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Is there diadem as Monarch
That His brow adorns
Yes a crown in very surety
But of thorns

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
If I find Him - if I follow
What His guerdon* here
Many a sorrow many a labour
Many a tear
(*Meaning "reward")

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
If I still hold closely to Him
What hath He at last
Sorrow vanquished labour ended
Jordan passed

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
If I ask Him to receive me
Will He say me nay
Not till earth and not till heaven
Pass away

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Finding following keeping struggling
Is He sure to bless
Saints apostles prophets martyrs
Answer - Yes
